description.value: You wrap the target in purifying flames. You can attempt to counteract a single poison or non-curse effect imparting the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened}, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied} condition. The target can choose to empower the flames with their life force, becoming @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 1} (or increasing their drained value by 1, if already under the condition) to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to your counteract check.

source.value: Xenos Paragon #168: King of the Mountain
